attributes.action: The people of the United Kingdom have lost faith in the governments ability to rule and maintain order
attributes.additional_details: London has been lawless and burning and it has taken 3 days for our prime minister to turn up off his holidays. Houses, businesses and families are suffering. The job of the government is to ensure the safety of the people and they have failed spectaularly. It is our opinion that the government has lost its already tenuous mandate to rule. Lies, broken promises and burning cities testify to this. General Election now!
